Class ConversationNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ConversationNode

  • public class ConversationNode
extends java.lang.Object
    ConversationNode is the class to keep track of individual pieces of a ConversationEvent (being one back-and-forth) between a Creature and a Player
    Since:
    12/21/2020
    Author:
    Bennett Forkner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Runnable endLogic
      The anonymous function that will be run when the ConversationNode is finished
      private Response[] responses
      The available responses that the player can say
      private java.lang.String statement
      The String that the subject of the conversation says

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConversationNode(java.lang.String statement, Response[] responses)
      The constructor for a ConversationNode with no endLogic
      ConversationNode(java.lang.String statement, Response[] responses, java.lang.Runnable endLogic)
      The constructor for a ConversationNode

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int converse(Creature subject)
      The method to display the statement that the subject says and handle the response of the Player

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConversationNode

        public ConversationNode(java.lang.String statement,
                        Response[] responses)
        The constructor for a ConversationNode with no endLogic
        Parameters:
        statement - The String that the Creature will say
        responses - The available responses that the Player can choose from

      • ConversationNode

        public ConversationNode(java.lang.String statement,
                        Response[] responses,
                        java.lang.Runnable endLogic)
        The constructor for a ConversationNode
        Parameters:
        statement - The String that the Creature will say
        responses - The available responses that the Player can choose from
        endLogic - The anonymous function that will be run when the ConversationNode ends

    • Method Detail

      • converse

        public int converse(Creature subject)
        The method to display the statement that the subject says and handle the response of the Player
        Parameters:
        subject - The Creature that is saying the statement
        Returns:
        the next ConversationEvent that should be run
